pc.perm_table_rating AS table_rating, pc.perm_flat_extra_amount AS flat_extra_amount, p.cwa_amount, uspGetAllApplicants ap.income, uspGetAllApplicants (SELECT tobacco_use_id uspGetAllApplicants FROM uspGetAllApplicants (SELECT RTRIM(dbo.clrLSDecrypt(ps.last_name, ''' + @password + ''')) + '', '' + RTRIM(dbo.clrLSDecrypt(ps.first_name, ''' + @password + ''')) AS Expr1 uspGetAllApplicants FROM bga_agency_number, p.team_id' uspGetAllApplicantsSET @sql3= N' FROM insured_application_info AS ap INNER JOIN uspGetAllApplicants policy_person_insured AS ppi INNER JOIN uspGetAllApplicants uspGetAllApplicants person AS per ON c.person_id = per.person_id uspGetAllApplicants WHERE (per.class_type = ''ASSN'') OR uspGetAllApplicants (per.class_type = ''GRP'')) AS assoc ON
